advisories.impact: A malicious application may be able to gain root privileges
advisories.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved validation.

advisories.impact: An application may be able to gain elevated privileges
advisories.description: An out-of-bounds write issue was addressed with improved bounds checking.

advisories.impact: An application may be able to read restricted memory
advisories.description: This issue was addressed with improved checks.

advisories.impact: Processing a maliciously crafted AppleScript binary may result in unexpected application termination or disclosure of process memory
advisories.description: An out-of-bounds read was addressed with improved bounds checking.

cves.credit: Qi Sun and Robert Ai of Trend Micro

advisories.impact: Processing a maliciously crafted AppleScript binary may result in unexpected application termination or disclosure of process memory
advisories.description: An out-of-bounds read was addressed with improved input validation.

advisories.impact: Processing a maliciously crafted file may lead to arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: A memory corruption issue was addressed with improved validation.

cves.credit: Qi Sun and Robert Ai of Trend Micro

advisories.impact: A maliciously crafted ZIP archive may bypass Gatekeeper checks
advisories.description: This issue was addressed with improved checks.

cves.credit: Ferdous Saljooki (@malwarezoo) and Jaron Bradley (@jbradley89) of Jamf Software, Mickey Jin (@patch1t)

advisories.impact: An application may be able to gain elevated privileges
advisories.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved state management.

advisories.impact: An application may be able to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges
advisories.description: A type confusion issue was addressed with improved state handling.

cves.credit: Wang Yu of cyberserval, and Pan ZhenPeng (@Peterpan0927) of Alibaba Security Pandora Lab

advisories.impact: An application may be able to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges
advisories.description: A type confusion issue was addressed with improved state handling.

cves.credit: Wang Yu of cyberserval, and Pan ZhenPeng (@Peterpan0927) of Alibaba Security Pandora Lab

advisories.impact: An application may be able to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges
advisories.description: An out-of-bounds write issue was addressed with improved bounds checking.

advisories.impact: An application may be able to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges
advisories.description: A use after free issue was addressed with improved memory management.

advisories.impact: An attacker in a privileged position may be able to perform a denial of service attack
advisories.description: A null pointer dereference was addressed with improved validation.

advisories.impact: A person with access to a Mac may be able to bypass Login Window
advisories.description: This issue was addressed with improved checks.

advisories.impact: A local attacker may be able to view the previous logged in user’s desktop from the fast user switching screen
advisories.description: An authentication issue was addressed with improved state management.

advisories.impact: A malicious application may be able to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges
advisories.description: A memory corruption issue was addressed with improved memory handling.

advisories.impact: A malicious app with root privileges may be able to modify the contents of system files
advisories.description: An issue in the handling of symlinks was addressed with improved validation.

advisories.impact: An application may be able to gain elevated privileges
advisories.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved state management.

advisories.impact: A plug-in may be able to inherit the application's permissions and access user data
advisories.description: This issue was addressed with improved checks.

advisories.impact: Processing maliciously crafted web content may disclose sensitive user information
advisories.description: A cookie management issue was addressed with improved state management.

advisories.impact: Processing a maliciously crafted mail message may lead to running arbitrary javascript
advisories.description: A validation issue was addressed with improved input sanitization.

cves.credit: Heige of KnownSec 404 Team (knownsec.com) and Bo Qu of Palo Alto Networks (paloaltonetworks.com)

advisories.impact: Processing maliciously crafted web content may disclose sensitive user information
advisories.description: A cookie management issue was addressed with improved state management.

advisories.impact: A local user may be able to write arbitrary files
advisories.description: A validation issue existed in the handling of symlinks. This issue was addressed with improved validation of symlinks.
